name: Moissa Knight, the Comet General
desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ] 
[ Monster Effect ] [ Pendulum Effect ] If you Pendulum Summon a monster(s): Place this card on either the top or bottom of the Deck.
[ Monster Effect ] When you draw this card: You can reveal it; during your Main Phase this turn, you can conduct 1 Pendulum Summon of a monster(s) from your hand in addition to your Pendulum Summon. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.)
pend_desc: If you Pendulum Summon a monster(s): Place this card on either the top or bottom of the Deck.
monster_desc:
